price: Cela (le châtiment), pour ce que vos mains ont accompli." Et Allah n’est point injuste envers les esclaves.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
